entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 2:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. A few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and periods of light wet snow changing to snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
